verses.text: Jacob \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* angels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God met \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w them|strong="H1870"\w*, \w he|strong="H1980"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H1870"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* camp \w of|strong="H1870"\w* God.” \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* named \w that|strong="H4397"\w* place Mahanaim.

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* sent messengers ahead \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother Esau \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Seir, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w country|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Edom.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* instructed \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* say \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* master \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, ‘\w Your|strong="H6440"\w* servant \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* says: \w I|strong="H6440"\w* have been staying \w with|strong="H6440"\w* Laban \w and|strong="H7971"\w* have remained \w there|strong="H6440"\w* \w until|strong="H7704"\w* \w now|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* oxen, donkeys, flocks, \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* maidservants. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* message \w to|strong="H5704"\w* inform \w my|strong="H3290"\w* master, \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H3541"\w* find favor \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* sight.’”

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5650"\w* returned \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*, they said, “\w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w went|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* brother Esau, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* \w coming|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*—\w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* four hundred \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H1980"\w* great fear \w and|strong="H3967"\w* distress, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* divided \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w two|strong="H1980"\w* camps, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* flocks \w and|strong="H3967"\w* herds \w and|strong="H3967"\w* camels.

\w He|strong="H8147"\w* thought, “If Esau comes \w and|strong="H5971"\w* attacks \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w then|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w can|strong="H8147"\w* escape.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Jacob declared, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father Abraham, God \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father Isaac, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H7604"\w* told \w me|strong="H5221"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H1961"\w* back \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* country \w and|strong="H4264"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* kindred, \w and|strong="H4264"\w* \w I|strong="H6215"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* make \w you|strong="H5221"\w* prosper,’

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* unworthy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kindness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H5973"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* servant. \w Indeed|strong="H7725"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* only \w my|strong="H3068"\w* staff \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* across \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Jordan, \w but|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H7725"\w* two camps.

Please deliver \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother Esau, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* afraid \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* attack \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mothers \w and|strong="H5650"\w* children \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* prosper, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w offspring|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea, \w too|strong="H5921"\w* numerous \w to|strong="H5921"\w* count.’”

\w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w* spent \w the|strong="H7760"\w* night \w there|strong="H7230"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w what|strong="H2233"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H7760"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* selected \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gift \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* brother Esau:
200 female goats, 20 male goats, 200 ewes, 20 rams,
30 milk camels \w with|strong="H6242"\w* their young, 40 cows, 10 bulls, 20 \w female|strong="H5795"\w* donkeys, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 10 \w male|strong="H8495"\w* donkeys.

\w He|strong="H6242"\w* entrusted \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants \w in|strong="H1121"\w* separate herds \w and|strong="H1121"\w* told \w them|strong="H1121"\w*, “Go \w on|strong="H6510"\w* ahead \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w me|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* keep some distance between \w the|strong="H1121"\w* herds.”

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* instructed \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lead, “\w When|strong="H5674"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* brother Esau meets \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* asks, ‘\w To|strong="H5414"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* belong, \w where|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w going|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w whose|strong="H5650"\w* animals \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?’

\w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* say, ‘\w They|strong="H3588"\w* belong \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* servant Jacob. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gift, \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* lord \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* behold, Jacob \w is|strong="H4310"\w* behind \w us|strong="H6440"\w*.’”

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* instructed \w the|strong="H7971"\w* second, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* third, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* following behind \w the|strong="H7971"\w* herds: “\w When|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* meet \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* say \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w thing|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘Look, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* servant Jacob \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w right|strong="H1696"\w* \w behind|strong="H1980"\w* \w us|strong="H4672"\w*.’” \w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* appease \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gift \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*. \w After|strong="H8145"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w can|strong="H1980"\w* face \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* perhaps \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* accept \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w spent|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* night \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* camp.

During \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3885"\w* got \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w took|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* two wives, \w his|strong="H6440"\w* two maidservants, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* eleven sons, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ford|strong="H5674"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Jabbok.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sent|strong="H5674"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w across|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* stream, \w along|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* possessions.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Jacob was \w left|strong="H5674"\w* \w all|strong="H5674"\w* alone, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w there|strong="H5158"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* wrestled \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* until daybreak.

\w When|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* man \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* could \w not|strong="H5927"\w* overpower \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* struck \w the|strong="H5704"\w* socket \w of|strong="H3498"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s hip \w and|strong="H5927"\w* dislocated \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* wrestled.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* said, “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w go|strong="H3201"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3709"\w* daybreak.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3201"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* bless \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.”

“\w What|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H7837"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name?” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* man \w asked|strong="H7971"\w*. “\w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* man said, “\w Your|strong="H4100"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H3290"\w* no longer \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w but|strong="H4100"\w* Israel, because \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* struggled \w with|strong="H8034"\w* God \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w with|strong="H8034"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* prevailed.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* requested, “Please tell \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w Why|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ask \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?” \w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w there|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w* Peniel, saying, “\w Indeed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* seen God face \w to|strong="H8033"\w* face, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* yet \w my|strong="H5046"\w* life \w was|strong="H8034"\w* spared.”

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* sun \w rose|strong="H3290"\w* \w above|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* passed \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* limping \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* hip.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* day \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Israelites do \w not|strong="H5674"\w* eat \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tendon attached \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* socket \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hip|strong="H3409"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* socket \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob’s \w hip|strong="H3409"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* struck \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* tendon.
